source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_00<tab>Novv would make a request of you, clutchfather to <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のノォヴは、冒険者を自分の家族と見込んで、お願いしたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_01<tab>Considering you one of his own, the wounded clutchfather Novv entrusts you with the rescue of the kidnapped Bouu. He explains to you that after falling to the masked Miqo'te, he managed to punch a hole in the culprit's skiff with his spear. Thus surmising that the vessel has been taken to Aleport for repairs, he bids you go in pursuit.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_01<tab>育成地を離れられないノォヴは、息子ボォウの救出を冒険者に託した。西ラノシアのエールポートに向かい、港に寄港している「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953601 /var>」を調べて、誘拐犯の乗っていた舟を探し出そう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_02<tab>No sooner do you locate the kidnapper's vessel than the enigmatic Sylvie appears, informing you that your quarry has once again eluded your─and her─grasp. She further reveals that the one you seek is a shadowy figure known as the Ebon Claw, and suggests that Baderon at the Drowning Wench may be able to tell you more about your man.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_02<tab>エールポートで、乗り捨てられた<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953601 /var>を発見した。そこに現れた謎の女性シルビアは、一連の事件を「獣人連続誘拐事件」と呼び、誘拐犯は「黒死の奏者」であると語った。「黒死の奏者」の詳しい情報を得るため、リムサ・ロミンサの溺れた海豚亭にいる「バデロン」から話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_03<tab>As Baderon tells it, the Ebon Claw is the epithet of Nhaza'a Jaab─an erstwhile adventurer and incomparable swordsman who now makes his trade as a hired blade to the most unscrupulous individuals in the realm. He warns you that it is in your best interests to steer well clear of the man, then recalls that Lieutenant Trachraet of the Maelstrom was asking around for you not long ago.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_03<tab>バデロンから話を聞いた。「黒死の奏者」は、ナザ・ア・ジャーブという凄腕の冒険者だったようだ。一方で、冒険者の所在を探している黒渦団将校がいたらしい。黒渦団：軍令部の「トラッハレート少甲士」に用件を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_04<tab>Trachraet explains that he was searching for you on behalf of his fellow storm lieutenant Skaetswys, who it would seem has another kobold crisis on her hands. Reunite with her at the 789th Order Dig and see what the trouble is this time.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_04<tab>トラッハレート少甲士から用件を聞いた。どうやら、外地ラノシアのコボルド族に、再び問題が起きているらしい。外地ラノシアの第789洞穴団の採掘地にいる「スケートスィス少甲士」と再会しよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_05<tab>Speaking with Skaetswys reveals an unsurprising turn of events─the kidnapper has struck again, this time ambushing a group of kobolds of the 175th Order in the heart of the Kobold Dig. Travel to the scene of the crime and question the victims in the hopes of tracking your quarry.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_05<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のスケートスィス少甲士と話した。彼女によると、ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山に棲むコボルド族が、何者かに誘拐されたらしい。より詳細な情報を得るため、外地ラノシアのコボルド軍試堀地にいる3匹の「第175洞穴団のコボルド族」から話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_06<tab>In shock and in shambles, the kobolds of the 175th Order explain that their alchemist, the beloved Bi Bi, was captured by a fearsome swordsman. As they tell it, he fled to the south, pursued by a mysterious green-haired girl. There may yet be time to catch your quarry.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_06<tab>コボルド軍試堀地にいた第175洞穴団のコボルド族から話を聞いた。誘拐されたのは、ピックマン789 ギ・グの幼馴染である、アルケミスト175 ビ・ビだったようだ。誘拐犯は彼女を連れ去り、「コボルド軍試堀地」から南に逃走したらしい。誘拐犯の足取りを追おう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_07<tab>You find Sylvie collapsed on the ground, clinging tenuously to consciousness. With labored breaths, she explains in frustration that she tracked Nhaza'a Jaab here, but was powerless to stop him. Return to the 789th Order Dig and report this distressing news to Skaetswys.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_07<tab>負傷し倒れている「シルビア」を発見した。彼女は誘拐犯の凶行を阻止しようとしたものの、一敗地に塗れたようだ。第789洞穴団の採掘地に戻り、「スケートスィス少甲士」に一連の顛末を報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_08<tab>You return to the 789th Order Dig to find Sylvie lying on the ground, her condition grave. She implores you to put a stop to the Ebon Claw's madness, while implying that there is yet another mastermind behind the scenes...before falling unconscious from her wounds. With Gi Gu proving ever incompetent, Skaetswys takes it upon herself to carry the girl to Camp Overlook to recuperate. Upon her return, she asks you to share any knowledge you have about your quarry, in hopes of plotting your next course of action.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_08<tab>スケートスィス少甲士のもとに戻ったところ、倒れて虫の息となったシルビアがいた。見かねたスケートスィス少甲士は、彼女をキャンプ・オーバールックに収容し、治療を施した。誘拐されたアルケミスト175 ビ・ビを救出するには、改めて対策を練る必要がありそうだ。シルフ族、サハギン族に続きコボルド族までも……獣人連続誘拐事件は次々と連鎖していくのであった。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_09<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_00<tab>Search for the kidnapper's skiff in Aleport.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_00<tab>エールポートで誘拐犯の乗った<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953601 /var>を探す

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Baderon in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_01<tab>リムサ・ロミンサのバデロンと話す

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Trachraet.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_02<tab>トラッハレート少甲士と話す

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Skaetswys at the 789th Order Dig.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_03<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のスケートスィス少甲士と再会する

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the 175th Order kobolds at the Kobold Dig.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_04<tab>コボルド軍試堀地の第175洞穴団のコボルド族と話す

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_05<tab>Track down the kidnapper at the Kobold Dig.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_05<tab>コボルド軍試堀地の周辺で誘拐犯の足取りを調べる

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_06<tab>Report to Skaetswys.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TODO_06<tab>スケートスィス少甲士に報告

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_000<tab>Pshhh...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You may lack for gills, but you are as much my child as any of those I have spawned. It is as your clutchfather that I would bessseech your aid.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_000フスィーッ……)) (( )) 02 /var>。
お前は我が家族の一員、も同然だ。
だからこそ、身内として頼みたい。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_001<tab>I know not what that masked shhhorewalker means to do with Bouu, but I fear for the boy's life. I would leave this moment in pursssuit, but I am not young, and my wounds are slow to heal. My <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>─pray rescue your brother in my ssstead.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_001息子、ボォウを卑劣な誘拐犯から助け出してもらえないか！
これ以上の被害を防ぐために、私はここを離れるわけにはいかん。
このとおりだ……頼む……フスィーッ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_002<tab>There is a sssaying among our people: the shark that swallows a Sahagin will choke on its ssscales. Though my clash with the kidnapper might have appeared a one-sided affair, I assure you it was not entirely so.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_002実は、誘拐犯と干戈を交えた際、隙をついて舟に槍を突き立てた。
「サメに食われても、喉元にヒレを立てろ」
……ただでは決して負けぬ、サハギン族の心意気だ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_003<tab>After I tumbled into the waves, I struck at the villain's skiff with my spear. Even in my weakened state, I was able to open a sssizable hole in its bottom. The vessel will flood before long, if it has not already.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_003おそらく船底には、小さからぬ穴があいただろう。
浸水したとなれば、そう遠くまでは航行できまい……。
誘拐犯は補修のため、近くの港に寄ったはずだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_004<tab>The fiend will have no choice but to dock at the nearessst port for repairs. And there is only one sssuitable location in western La Noscea. Pshhh! You will find our man at Aleport─you can be sure of it!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_004フスィーッ……。
西ラノシアにあるヒトの港……おそらく「エールポート」。
そこにいけば、きっと誘拐犯の手掛かりがあるはず！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_005<tab>Go forth, O strongest of my <var 08 E905 ((daughters)) ((sons)) /var>! Your ssspawnbrother's life hangs in the balance!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_005フスィーッ……頼んだぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
我が頼もしきよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_006<tab>Pshhh... You must pursssue the fiend to Aleport, my <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var>. Your ssspawnbrother's life hangs in the balance!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_NOVV_000_006フスィーッ……「エールポート」で、
船底に傷跡、ないしは補修した跡のある舟を探せ。
そうすれば、ボォウを連れ去った男の足取りが掴めるだろう。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>A survey of the skiff reveals nothing unusual.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>船底に異常はないようだ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>You notice a small hole in the skiff's bottom, identifying it as the kidnapper's vessel.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SYSTEM_000_009船底にあいた穴に、帆布の切れ端が詰め込まれている。
どうやらこれが、探していた舟のようだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_010<tab>(-???-)Again <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> comes, unaware that what <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> seeks has already been swept away by the tide.
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_010<tab>(-？？？？-)一足……遅かったようね……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_011<tab>Just couldn't leave well enough alone, could you, stranger? Ah, well. I suppose it matters little now.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_011「獣人誘拐犯」は、私が追う。
アナタの出番はないと言ったはずよ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_012<tab>I know who it is you seek...for I seek him as well. I also know that our man left Aleport not bells ago, and none in town can speak as to his whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_012あいつは半刻前、ここに舟を乗り捨て、
エールポートを去っていったわ……。
残念ながら、その後の行先は不明……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_013<tab>First he came for sylphs, then for Sahagin. Yes, it is clear enough. The wheels are in motion, and they will not stop until every beast tribe has been crushed beneath...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_013シルフ族に続いて、サハギン族までも……。
ついに……回り出してしまったのね……。
連鎖する悲劇の歯車が……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_014<tab>He must be stopped─and I will be the one to stop him!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_014ゆるせない……必ず暴いてみせる……。
エオルゼアの5つの種族を狙った、
獣人連続誘拐事件の……真相を……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_Q1_000_000<tab>About these kidnappings...
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_Q1_000_000<tab>獣人連続誘拐事件！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A1_000_001<tab>Why beastmen?
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A1_000_001<tab>いったい、何のために！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A1_000_002<tab>Who is that masked Miqo'te?
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A1_000_002<tab>あの誘拐犯は、何者だ？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_015<tab>Why, indeed? If I had an answer, it would make our search that much the easier. Alas, the Ebon Claw's motives are as inscrutable as that red eye...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_015それは……私にもわからない……。
その理由と目的を探るため、私はあの男を追っている……。
「黒死の奏者」と呼ばれる……あの男を……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_016<tab>...So you saw him as well. Clad all in black, with a face of metal and that red eye burning in the darkness...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_016……どうやらアナタも見たようね。
あの男……顔の半分を仮面で隠した、
黒装束のミコッテ族の剣士を……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_017<tab>They call him the Ebon Claw, as those who speak his birth name are said to be not long for the world. To what dark end he preys upon the beast tribes, I cannot say─only that he cannot be allowed to continue.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_017あの男は「黒死の奏者」と呼ばれる凄腕の冒険者……。
獣人を誘拐する……その理由と目的を探るため、
私は奴を追っている……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_018<tab>If you would know more of our quarry, seek out Baderon at the Drowning Wench.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_018あの男について詳しく知りたいなら、
「溺れた海豚亭」のマスター、バデロンに聞いて。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_019<tab>I must move quickly...before tragedy strikes again...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_019……私には……もう時間がない……。
次は……どの種族が標的に……される……？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_020<tab>Well, if it ain't me favorite regular, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! 'Ave ye come for a pint or a tale─mayhap both?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_020よう、いらっしゃい。
誰かと思えば、)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃねぇか！
……何？　俺に聞きたいことがあるって？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_021<tab>Bugger me with a spear, an' tell me ye didn't just say what I think ye said!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_021なっ……！？
お前さん……今「黒死の奏者」と言ったか！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_022<tab>I told ye not to tell me that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Aye, just 'earing those words sends a shiver up me spine...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_022チッ、忌々しい名だぜ……。
その名を聞くだけで、背筋に冷たいモンが走りやがる……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_023<tab>...The Ebon Claw. Nhaza'a Jaab─though I'd suggest you avoid speakin' that name if ye prefer yer 'ead attached to yer body. One o' the five deadliest sellswords in Eorzea, by my measure.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_023「黒死の奏者」……本名「ナザ・ア・ジャーブ」……。
恐らく、このエオルゼアで5本の指に入るだろう、
超一流の冒険者にして、天才的な剣技の持ち主。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_024<tab>Not that yer like to 'ave 'eard of 'im. Prefers to keep to the shadows, ye see. Smugglin', assassination, extortion─the dirtier the job, the more it titillates the man.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_024しかし、その性情は冷酷非道にして残虐無比。
……そのあまりの鬼畜の所業に、
冒険者ギルドから登録を抹消され、永久追放された……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_025<tab>Believe it or not, 'e started out as an adventurer not unlike yerself. Some reckoned 'e'd be just the 'ero the realm was lookin' for. But doin' good didn't seem to satisfy 'im none, and it didn't take 'im long to turn to the dark side...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_025破壊工作、大量殺戮、要人暗殺……。
奴は、どんなに汚い仕事でも請け負い、そして完璧に遂行する。
目ん玉が飛び出るくらい法外な報酬でな。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_026<tab>Yer as strong and sure a <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> as I know, and that's why I give ye this advice: keep a wide berth o' that man. I'd 'ate to see ye end up like...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_026……お前さんは腕の立つ冒険者だ、それは認める。
だが、悪いことは言わねぇ、「黒死の奏者」にだけは関わるなよ。
奴は奏でるように死を振りまきやがる、危険な存在だ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_027<tab>...Which reminds me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Someone stopped by the Wench not long ago, askin' if I'd seen ye about.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_027……そうそう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
実は俺からも、ちょうど、お前さんに用があったんだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_028<tab>An officer of the Maelstrom, no less. I believe 'e said 'is name was Trachraet.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_028ついさっき、この酒場に黒渦団の将校がやってきてな。
どうやら必死になって、おまえさんを探していたようだ。
何か、緊急の用件があったのかもしれん。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_029<tab>The burly bloke didn't share any details, but it seemed a matter o' some urgency. Ye'd best get along to Maelstrom Command and see what the fuss is.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_029将校の名は「トラッハレート少甲士」と言ったか。
急いでいるようだったから、「黒渦団：軍令部」に寄って、
話を聞いてやってくれねぇか？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_030<tab>Can't say for sure what Trachraet wanted, but it sounded like a matter o' some urgency.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_BADERON_000_030将校の名は「トラッハレート少甲士」と言ったか。
急いでいるようだったから、「黒渦団：軍令部」に寄って、
話を聞いてやってくれねぇか？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_030<tab>Thank the Navigator! Just the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was lookin' to see!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_030おお、冒険者さん！　探しましたよ！
実は、折り入って頼みたいことがありまして……
何度も申し訳ありません。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_031<tab>Ye remember Lieutenant Skaetswys, no doubt? Aye, she leaves quite an impression. And it would seem you left quite an impression on 'er, as well─she asked for ye specifically by name.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_031実は、外地ラノシアから報告がありまして。
貴方もよくご存じの「スケートスィス少甲士」からです。
なんでも相談したい案件があるとのこと……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_032<tab>It would seem there's another storm brewin' at the 789th Order Dig, and she reckons she needs yer steady 'and to navigate through. As fer the nature o' the storm, that ye'll 'ave to 'ear straight from 'er.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_032きっと、コボルド族の間で、また何か問題が起きたのでしょう。
「第789洞穴団の採掘地」に赴き、彼女の話を聞いてください！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_033<tab>Just between you and me, sometimes I can't 'elp but think that lass goes out of 'er way to look for trouble.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_TRACHRAET_000_033スケートスィスの奴、またいらぬ事に首をつっこんで、
問題を大きくしているでしょうか？
……まったく、頭が痛いですよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I thought ye'd never come! We've got a crisis on our 'ands 'ere, and I ain't just talkin' about this oversized bilge rat's aversion to anythin' resemblin' honest work!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_040あっ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、おつかれさまです！
その後、お変わりないですかー！？
アタシはこのとおり、今日も元気にコイツらをしばき倒してます！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_041<tab>I tell ye, after all you and I did to end Zo Ga's reign o' terror, ye'd think 'e'd make the slightest effort to raise 'is order from the arse end o' kobold society, wouldn't ye? Well, ye'd be wrong!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_041憎きゾ・ガの奴は失脚したけど、
復権のために、あくせく働いてるみたい。
だから、コイツらを鍛えて対抗させなくちゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_042<tab>But that's neither 'ere nor there. The reason I wanted ye goes beyond this lot o' loungers─we've got a catastrophe facin' all o' koboldkind! I tell ye, these days it's out o' the bomb's nest, into the cauldron!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_042……と、思ってたんだけど、ところがどっこい！
それよりも、重大な問題が起きちゃったんです！
ううう、一難去ってまた一難！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_043<tab>What sort o' crisis, ye ask? Scores o' kobolds from the mines just up and disappearin'! Aye, one moment they're there, an' the next they're gone! Who─or <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>─could possibly be responsible for this!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_043実は、鉱山に棲むコボルド族が、行方不明になったらしいんです。
うむむむ……コボルド族の誘拐事件？　犯人は……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_Q2_000_000<tab>I'd wager we're dealing with...
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_Q2_000_000<tab>そう、ズバリ犯人は……

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A2_000_001<tab>...A rogue Roegadyn!
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A2_000_001<tab>ルガディン族？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A2_000_002<tab>...A serial beastman kidnapper!
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_A2_000_002<tab>獣人連続誘拐犯！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_044<tab>Gwahahaha! Ye got me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I always thought the realm would be better off without these good-for-nothin'─are ye out o' your bleedin' gourd?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_044よぉし、わかった！
そうそう、アタシみたいなルガディン族が……
ぐっへっへー、悪いコボルド族はいねーかー……って、オイ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_045<tab>Aye, the rumors from the Shroud and La Noscea 'aven't escaped me ears. Beastmen spirited away from their 'omes. But one question remains: why?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_045って……え？　獣人連続誘拐犯！？
……もしかして、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、
思い当たる節があるんですか！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_046<tab>From the sound of it, ye've already done some investigatin' of yer own. I'll see what I can get out of Gi Gu and the rest o' these laggards. What say you survey the scene o' the crime?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_046だったら、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
お手数ですが、事件の現地調査をお願いできますか？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_047<tab>Word 'as it that an inspection team from the 175th were ambushed right from the 'eart o' the Kobold Dig. The 175th's a friendly lot─ye remember Bi Bi, no doubt?─I reckon they won't be stingy with information.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_047誘拐されたのは「第175洞穴団」のコボルド族で、
「コボルド軍試堀地」の視察中だったようです。
それなりに友好的な連中なので、きっと話を聞けるはず！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_048<tab>With this kidnapper about, I thank the Twelve I wasn't born a beastman. But I must confess─I 'aven't been this excited since the two of us teamed up to bring down Zo Ga!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_048むむむ……エオルゼア全土を巻き込んだ、
蛮族の連続誘拐事件かぁ……。
なんだか壮大な展開……不謹慎だけどワクワクしちゃうわね！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_049<tab>The 789th's favorite adventurer returns! You will be pleased to hear that we have been working hard─yes, yes, very hard, indeed. Gi Gu simply must share with you his latest discovery!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_049ありゃ！　冒険者さーん　久しぶーり！
ねぇねぇ　聞いてーよ！
最近　ボクたーち　新しい技術を開発したんだーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_050<tab>After days of hard research─yes, yes, very hard─Gi Gu has taught himself how to sleep with his eyes open─peeled, wide, open! We can nap as often as we like, and the inspectors will be none the wiser! Gi Gu is quite the genius, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_050それーは　ズバーリ！
「立ったまま目を開けて寝る」方法！
これで仕事をしているフリができるーよ？　すごいでーしょ？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175A_000_060<tab>Bi Bi! Where did he take Bi Bi!? Where...!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175A_000_060た　助けーて！　助けてーよ！
アイーツ　いきなーり　やってきーて！
ビ・ビーが！　仲間のビ・ビーが　拐われたーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175A_000_061<tab>Unghhh... Bi...Bi...
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175A_000_061<tab>うううーっ　ビ・ビー！　ビ・ビー！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175B_000_062<tab>It stings─burns, sears, stings! I set my strongest bombs against him, but they could do nothing. No, no, nothing...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175B_000_062イタタタタ……イターイ……イターイよ……！
ボクーの攻撃も　ボムの爆発も　まるで歯が立たなーい……。
アイーツ　バケモノだーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175B_000_063<tab>I've seen no overdweller so strong. No, no, not ever!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175B_000_063あんなーに　強いヤーツに会ったのーは　初めてだーよ……。
コワーイ　コワーイよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_064<tab>I...I saw it all. Yes, yes, I did. He grabbed Bi Bi with one arm, pressed steel against her neck. It was too much to watch─too distressing, too painful, too much!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_064仲間の「アルケミスト175 ビ・ビ」が　連れていかれたーよ！
アイーツ　南の方に逃げていったーよ！　
あそーこは　行き止まりなのーに……どういうつもりだーよ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_065<tab>I was too scared─yes, yes, too cowardly to come out of hiding. But the overdweller girl─yes, yes, the girl with green hair. She chased him─followed him, pursued him, chased him to the south!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_065ビ・ビを助けるためーに
さっき　ヒトの女の子が　誘拐犯を追っていったーよ！
いまごーろ　犯人を追いつめてるーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_066<tab>The overdweller girl chased the kidnapper to the south. Oh, our dear Bi Bi─our precious, our beloved, our dear Bi Bi!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_KOBOLD175C_000_066ヒトの女の子が　誘拐犯を追っていったーよ！
南の方で　きっと犯人を　追いつめてるーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_070<tab>C-Curses... He's too...unggghhh!
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_070<tab>……くっ……うううううっ……！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_071<tab>D-Don't touch me! I...I can stand on my own.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_071ア……アナタは……。
さ、触らないで……！　自分で……立てる……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_072<tab>My deductions were flawless... I knew the kobolds were next... I waited, waited to strike, and yet... I could do nothing...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_072くっ　くやしい……！
次の標的はコボルド族だって……わかってたのに……
奴の凶行を阻止することが……できなかった……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_073<tab>Nhaza'a Jaab─the Ebon Claw. I should have known I would be no match for that monster...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_073「黒死の奏者」……ナザ・ア・ジャーブ……なんて強さなの……。
私ひとりじゃ……まるで歯が立たない……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_074<tab>My strength wanes... At this rate, I shall be... I...I must go...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_074ああっ、もう……駄目……。
チカラが失われてしまう……このままじゃ……私……
早く……戻らなくては……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_075<tab>That...that one is too strong...
target: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_075<tab>う……ううう……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_076<tab>Wh-What is happening here!? How is Gi Gu supposed to nap with all this disruption─disturbance, disorder, disruption!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_076ぼ　ぼ　冒険者さーん！
ど　どうなってんーの！？　何がおきてるーの！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_080<tab>Wh-Who is this overdweller girl!? What is she doing here!? And where can Gi Gu go to nap in peace─quiet, silence, peace!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_080ど　どうなってんーの！？
スケートスィスさーん　このヒトーは　どちらさーま！？

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_081<tab>Ugh, 'ow in the bloody 'ells should I know!? Now quit yer blatherin'─the poor lass's wounded!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_081知らない！　でも採掘地の前に倒れてたの！
しっかりして！　大丈夫！？
すぐに傷の手当てをするから……！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_082<tab>W-Worry not for me... Please... You must stop him...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_082へ、平気……ど、どうってことない……。
それより……拐われたコボルド族の足取りを……。
早く……アイツの後を追うの……！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_083<tab>Nhaza'a Jaab...the Ebon Claw...sword to the underworld...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_083ナザ・ア・ジャーブは、闇社会に生きる冒険者。
だから一連の獣人連続誘拐事件は、奴が首謀者じゃない……
奴は雇われただけ……依頼された仕事をしているに過ぎない……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_084<tab>And yet he is but a blade for hire... No...another...<cough>...pulls the...<wheeze>...strings...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_084事件の裏には、法外な報酬で奴を雇った黒幕がいる……
そいつを突きとめれば……
この事件の……真相を知ることができる……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_085<tab>Enough, lass! Save yer strength!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_085無理しちゃ駄目だってば！
しゃべらないでっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_086<tab>He must...<cough>...be stopped... Ixal...Amalj'aa...no beastman is...<wheeze>...
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_086残る獣人……奴らの標的は……
イクサル族とアマルジャ族……。
お、お願い……！　奴らの暴走を……止め……て……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SILVIA_000_087<tab>...safe...
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_088<tab>Is she dead─expired, perished, dead!? Oh no, no─this cannot be! Bring my pickaxe! Gi Gu shall give the overdweller girl a proper burial!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_088あ　あわわわ……死んーだ！　死んじゃったーよ！
ご愁傷さーま……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_089<tab>Fool! She's not dead─but <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> will be if you don't stop yer bloody whinin'!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_089コラっ！　勝手に殺すなっ！
気を失っただけよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_090<tab>The girl still lives, but she'll need an 'ealer's 'and an' a clean bed, neither of which she'll find 'ere. I'll see 'er to Camp Overlook.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_090)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、ここで待っててください。
この子をキャンプ・オーバールックに連れて行ってきます。
さすがにここは、傷の治療をするには不潔すぎるから……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_091<tab>Does the overdweller imply that we are...<var 1A 02 /var>unclean<var 1A 01 /var>!? Gi Gu takes umbrage at your remark─offense, insult, umbrage! Why, Gi Gu took a bath just last year! Yes, yes, he did!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_091ふ　フケーツ？　そーう？
ボクたーち　ちゃんと半年に一度は　水浴びしてるーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_092<tab>Worry not for the girl. She'll be safe at Camp Overlook. Our priority now should be rescuin' Bi Bi from her kidnapper.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_092安心してください。
あの子……シルビアさんはもう大丈夫。
キャンプ・オーバールックで、しかるべき処置をしました。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_093<tab>My beloved Bi Bi was kidnapped!? Why─yes, yes, why did you not tell me sooner!? What is the ransom? Gi Gu has two chunks of ore and a handful of sulphur!
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_093それにしてーも……ふぐっ　うえっ……。
ビ・ビが拐われーた！　タイヘーン　どうしよーう！
ボク　お金ないーよ！　身代金なんて払えないーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_094<tab>...Somehow I don't think that'll be enough. Besides, I 'ave a feelin' it ain't just riches our man is after.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_094ビ・ビちゃん……。
なんかあの子、いつもそういう役回りよねぇ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_095<tab>It would seem poor Bi Bi's life is at stake...again. We'll need to move quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I need ye to share with me anything and everything ye know o' the man─we'll get to the bottom o' this together.
target:
TEXT_BANALL040_01470_SKAETSWYS_000_095……と、呆れている場合じゃないわ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
今までの情報を整理して、今後の対策を練りましょう！
